DOC.brief_summary: Health-related Quality life Danish stage IB-III cutaneous melanoma patient .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Surgical Late Effects Melanoma Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The aim PhD-study evaluate , large cohort Danish melanoma patient : 1 . Health-related quality life assess psychological , physical social well-being 2 . Physical long term side effect ( lymphoedema , scar neuropathic pain ) 3 . Lymphoedema assess clinical examination DXA scan
DOC.criteria: AJCC stage IBIII cutaneous melanoma patient At least one year followup melanoma surgery Pregnancy Bilateral axilla groin melanoma surgery
